remarks: A version of ~ fodom that doesn't require the Axiom of Choice ~ ax-ac . If ` A ` has choice sequences of length ` B ` , then any surjection from ` A ` to ` B ` can be inverted to an injection the other way. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement: fodomacn $p |- ( A e. AC_ B -> ( F : A -onto-> B -> B ~<_ A ) ) $.
